summary: TAKATA RECALL.  RECEIVED LETTER FROM FORD IN JULY 2016.  WE HAVE TRIED A NUMBER OF TIMES TO HAVE THIS RECTIFIED.  BUT SO FAR WE HAVE HAD NO SUCCESS.  TODAY WE WERE TOLD TO WAIT FOR A LETTER FROM FORD TO TELL US WHEN IT CAN BE FIXED.  THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE.  IT IS LIKE RIDING IN A BOMB.  PLEASE HELP US IF YOU CAN.  THANK YOU
